660200.name: Transistor Defense
660200.description:
Transistor Defense is a strategic tower defense experience set within a corrupted digital realm, where you must defend against the relentless advance of a rogue sentient AI determined to overtake the network.

Deploy a powerful arsenal of defensive structures to protect your core. Choose from a variety of tower types, each with distinct roles with the capability of being enhanced with powerful modules.

Each enemy wave becomes more challenging as the AI evolves, introducing new enemy types and  behaviors. To survive, you'll need to adapt — utilizing a robust shop system that offers meaningful choices and powerful synergies between tower types.

After every wave, dive into a roguelike progression system through the in-run shop. Spend earned resources to acquire randomized upgrades, or additional towers to tilt the odds in your favor. Every run presents different options, ensuring no two sessions play the same — experimentation and adaptability are key to mastering the network.

EARLY ACCESS NOTICE

Transistor Defense is currently in active development as an Early Access title. We’re working closely with the community to refine systems, balance gameplay, and expand content.

Please note: Player progression, save data, and leaderboard rankings may be reset periodically during updates as we continue to iterate and improve the game experience.
660200.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
